text: Kovalčík or Kovalcik is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Ivan Kovalčik Mileševac (born 1968), Serbian icon and fresco painter * Štefan Kovalčík (1921–1973), Czechoslovakian/Slovak Olympic cross country skier * Zak Kovalcik (born 1983), American track cyclist
title: Kovalčík
